actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to repeal the withdrawal of consent to sue the United States in a proceeding involving gold, silver, currency of the United States, including claims arising out of any surrender, seizure, or acquisition of any such gold, silver, or currency.

summary.text: Repeals the provision of law which withdraws consent to sue the United Staes in a proceeding involving gold, silver, currency of the United States, including claims arising out of any surrender, seizure, or acquisition of any such gold, silver, or currency.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the withdrawal of consent to sue the United States in a proceeding involving gold, silver, currency of the United States, including claims arising out of any surrender, seizure, or acquisition of any such gold, silver, or currency.
